content: Incredible app! As a self-taught drummer, I find this app to be extremely helpful in developing my technique. Thank you for creating this app and sharing your knowledge.
replyContent: Thank you Stephen for the 5-star review and for the beautiful words. We are happy to hear that you love our app. All the best and happy practicing!

content: Very useful learning tool.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!! We are happy to hear if our customers are satisfied! Happy practicing!

content: Bumm bummm
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review, we really appreciate your kind words!

content: One of the most comprehensive drum apps out there , Ferenc is a legend. And UI of the app is so good for breaking down each and every thing.

content: Amazing app, it makes learning a lot easier than other apps in the store, it's like you'll have a teacher who is assisting you always, lessons are levelled to suit the needs of the learners.
replyContent: Thank you Vijai so much for your review and 5 stars! This is the reason we created the app. Making it easier for people to learn from the comfort of their home.

replyContent: Thank you! Happy to hear that you find value in our app! Enjoy!

content: this is an awesome app, thanks!
replyContent: Thank you! We are glad to hear that you are enjoying using Drum School App!

content: Videos not working so I removed this app, useless for me!
replyContent: We are very sorry to hear this. Could you please send us an email to support@drumschoolapp.com and tell us what device and what operating system are you using? Thank you!

content: This is fantastic and a real go-to app for drumming theory, I have used it intensively for the past year. However the videos have stopped working since I last used the app a few weeks ago. I have reset the app, but still no video functionality. Is this a problem for anyone else?
replyContent: Sorry Ian for the trouble. So far we only had 2 cases of this problem. The videos have to be downloaded separately. Thatâ€™s how we kept the app so light. Please send us an email to support@drumschoolapp.com with your device and operating system info, if you still experiencing this problem and we will fix it right away. Thank you!

content: This is so worth the price. Isolating each hand, or foot, slowing it down...it's AMAZING.
replyContent: Thank you Alex, we really appreciate all feedbacks. Happy to know you are enjoying the app!

content: Very helpfully
replyContent: We are grateful for your review Eduardo! Thank you! Happy practicing :)

content: Best drum app Ive come across. Brilliant information and grooves
replyContent: Thank you! We appreciate you taking the time to review and give us great ratings! All the best and happy practicing!

content: Sound distorts and stutters on many tracks when bass line is turned on or when certain fills are selected, e.g. Disco 8 fill no. 2. Great app idea, poor file compression?
replyContent: Thank you Ryan for your feedback. This is now fixed in the latest version. You can also send an email to support@drumschoolapp.com if you have any other questions.

content: Great app! Read about it in Modern Drummer and had to check it out.

This is perfect for you if you are auditioning for lets say a cruise ship position or a piano bar, or anything that would ask you for a variety of different genres. It gives you 10 or so extremely basic grooves in multiple styles. You have a basic arsenal here. I didnt think there were fills, but they are hidden under the dots on the groove page. I am hoping this developer comes out with more advanced drum licks. This is GREAT for beginners.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Enjoy your practice!

content: Best drum app I've seen.  I can play very basic stuff on the drums and this app will clearly help me improve.  A lot of content for the price!

I just purchased and downloaded the app and when I try to play the video, it says, "can not play video." This wouldn't be too bad but after the error occurs the app freezes in place. I tried restarting the app but this time when I enter the lesson, the same error message automatically appears. Is this because of my phone being new (HTC 10) or does this app not work at all on phones?
replyContent:
We've fixed the permission issue that was affecting some users with Android 6 Marshmallow and Android 7 Nougat. Please update to the latest version of Drum School 2.1 or higher. 
Thank you!

If you're still having issues, please contact us through our website or email us at support@drumschoolapp.com.

content: Has everything you need!
It really has such a variety of beats and will allow you to seperate out parts that may be challenging you. Worth the money.
Nice variety of beats
Great app!  Easy to use!

I've been using this app on my Mac computer and I couldn't wait to get the Android version to have the app on my phone. Great selection of grooves and practice ideas with videos. I highly recommend it to every musician.
